0.2.name: wordpress/webcam-comment
0.2.description:
Lets visitors easily grab webcam images of themselves directly on the site, and add that image to a comment. It will then show up as a thumbnail next to the comment and will show a bigger image when clicked.

Features: * Let's the user attach and remove an image to the comment * Skinnable GUI (normal .png's)

Requirements: * Flash Player * Javascript * "Avatars" ("Show Avatars" must be activated from the "Discussion Settings") * And of course a webcam
